CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Complete Delivery stage positioned above or below the Provide Feedback or Rating stage?
SRP.A: The Complete Delivery stage is positioned {above} the Provide Feedback or Rating stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Prepare for Pickup?
VE.A: The value of stage Prepare for Pickup is {1790}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Book Transport Service?
VE.A: The value of stage Book Transport Service is {3014}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Book Transport Service, with a value of {3014}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Provide Feedback or Rating, with a value of {521}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Complete Delivery to stage Provide Feedback or Rating?
SC.A: Decreased by {115} Thousand Shipments from stage Complete Delivery to stage Provide Feedback or Rating.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Book Transport Service to stage Prepare for Pickup?
SC.A: Decreased by {1224} Thousand Shipments from stage Book Transport Service to stage Prepare for Pickup.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Begin Transportation to stage Complete Delivery?
SC.A: Decreased by {193} Thousand Shipments from stage Begin Transportation to stage Complete Delivery.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 732? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Book Transport Service} stage has {3014}, the {Prepare for Pickup} stage has {1790}, the {Begin Transportation} stage has {829}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 732? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Complete Delivery} stage has {636}, the {Provide Feedback or Rating} stage has {521}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 578 and 2402? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Prepare for Pickup} stage has {1790}, the {Begin Transportation} stage has {829}, the {Complete Delivery} stage has {636}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Complete Delivery to Provide Feedback or Rating, or from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Transport Service} to {Prepare for Pickup} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Prepare for Pickup to Begin Transportation, or from stage Begin Transportation to Complete Delivery?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Prepare for Pickup} to {Begin Transportation} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Begin Transportation to Complete Delivery, from stage Book Transport Service to Prepare for Pickup, or from stage Complete Delivery to Provide Feedback or Rating?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Transport Service} to stage {Prepare for Pickup} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Book Transport Service} and {Prepare for Pickup} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Complete Delivery} and {Provide Feedback or Rating} stages.
